entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain this evening then to periods of rain before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 9:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
